column4: ANyone have any input on what runs better on Kubuntu/Ubuntu of either VM Ware or Virtual Box?  I need to install one of them on a server
VMWare is the better software, imo
would yopu say VM Ware is stable to run 24/7 for a critical business application?
yes, i use it in a production environment daily
lots of people are moving to virtualization of servers now instead of physical machines
so it's very much a dependable solution
nice to hear.  I have a customer database management software I use for my business that is Microshaft dependant
shouldn't be a problem.  For example, I have a centos machine running vmware with an ms server 2003 machine running
on which nearly all of my client's mission critical stuff is running
so...have no fear, you can trust it fully
is it possible to do remote login to the system running within vm ware?
yes...what I do is install Logmein on the ms machine
Perfect... thats how I do it now  :o)
yep...then just putty to the linux side if you need to
